name: basti1302-wait_for
author: Bastian Krol
summary: A pseudo resource type to wait for a condition to become satisfied.
description:
A pseudo resource type for puppet that enables you to wait for
certain conditions. You can use shell commands to query arbitrary things and
either react on the exit code or match the output of the command against a
regular expression.

properties.name: regex
properties.doc: The regex to match the commmand's output against.

parameters.name: query
parameters.doc: The command to execute, the output of this command will be matched against regex.

parameters.name: polling_frequency
parameters.doc: How long to sleep in between retries.

parameters.name: max_retries
parameters.doc: How often to retry the query before timing out.

parameters.name: environment
parameters.doc: An array of strings of the form 'key=value', which will be injected into the environment of the query command.
